title: Novotel Gate Hotel launches Pay what you feel offer
text:
(MENAFN Press) Gabbiano Italian Restaurant at Novotel Abu Dhabi Gate Hotel brings for the first time ever in the capital a unique "Pay what you feel" offer, allowing guests and visitors to choose what they want to pay for the food they have ordered.

Gabbiano Italian Restaurant believes in using the freshest and finest in season ingredients available in the market. The Food and Beverage Manager at Novotel and Ibis Abu Dhabi Gate Hotels, Bernard O'Neill, strongly believes that this is one of the best opportunities for Guests to come and judge for themselves their menu through this unique "Pay what you feel" experience!!! And he adds that they will not be disappointed"

Located on the ground floor of the Novotel Abu Dhabi Gate Hotel the restaurant opens out onto a large seated terrace by the creek where you can enjoy al fresco dining in some of the most peaceful surroundings in the city
Every day from 6pm â€œ 11pm starting Thursday October 01st till Wednesday October 07th 
Prior reservation is necessary and you can book your table everyday between 10am and 5pm on 050 634 10 91," the hotel said.
